overview: From the acclaimed TV program Ready, Steady, Wiggle! Series 2, Anthony has selected twelve of the tastiest favorites from ‘Cowboy Anthony’ to ‘Captain’s Magic Buttons’! They’re served up fresh with over 40 songs and a delightful dessert of wiggly bloopers and a photo gallery. When asked to describe Anthony’s Fruity Feast, he replied, ‘It’s yummy, yummy'! Anthony's Fruity Feast has just begun and is full of tasty treats!
tagline: Anthony's Fruity Feast! is the 3rd Ready, Steady, Wiggle! compilation DVD.
title: The Wiggles - Anthony's Fruity Feast!
